title: Stunning Modern 3+3 Silver Lake Home Walkable to Everything!
posting_body: Stunning, modern 3 bedroom, 3 bath 1,850SF Silver Lake home with a large backyard for lease.

Located on one of the prettiest streets in Silver Lake, this 3-level newer construction home, built-in 2014 sits perched on a hill surrounded by lush greenery with awe-inspiring views of DTLA and the Silver Lake hills.
This light-filled home has modern amenities, including an eat-in island kitchen, high-end appliances, central AC, and solar panels.
The primary suite encompasses an entire floor and features a beautifully appointed bathroom, separate seating/office area, private balcony, and two walk-in closets.
The second bedroom includes a separate seating area/work space and a large balcony.
The third bedroom, spacious and well-lit, has a floor to ceiling window with views of the SIlverlake hills .
Large glass doors lead you to spacious balconies on every level so you can bask in the L.A. al fresco lifestyle.
The large deck downstairs is an ideal spot for entertaining - spark up the barbecue and invite friends for an evening under the stars.
The deck is surrounded by lush greenery and trees planted by the owner (avocado, guava, orange, lime, peach), making it a perfect place to hang a hammock, relax, and eat seasonal fruit!
The yard is completely fenced to keep your pup from wandering.
This section of Descanso Drive is special, with a wonderful sense of community.
Set above Sunset, you will enjoy breathtaking views that are especially magical at night.
It is a convenient stroll to Silver Lake's great restaurants, coffee spots, and specialty shops but high enough from the hustle and bustle to provide tranquility.
Wake up and enjoy coffee in the morning sun on one of your balconies, or take a stroll to All Day Baby and grab Silverlake's best breakfast sandwich.
At the end of the day decompress with an evening walk around the reservoir or bring your pooch to our neighborhood dog park for a meet-up with your doggy neighbors.
With a beautifully landscaped median adding greenery and charm to an already tree-filled hillside, it is a lush and green urban oasis.
A true haven in the city, this neighborhood offers a sense of community filled with friendly neighbors.
This spacious modern home has it all!
Location, light, large bedrooms, multiple home-office options, and much more.
Presented by Mark Duncan w/ EXP Realty.
Brandy Brooks
Sotheby's International Realty
